Font(byte[], FontSystemSettings?)

Creates a new Font instance using the provided font data in memory.

public Font(byte[] data, FontSystemSettings? settings = null)

Parameters

data byte[]

A byte array containing the raw font data.

settings FontSystemSettings

Settings used to configure the internal font system.

Font(string, FontSystemSettings?)

Creates a new Font instance by loading font data from the specified file path.

public Font(string path, FontSystemSettings? settings = null)

Parameters

path string

The file path to the font file to load.

settings FontSystemSettings

Settings used to configure the internal font system.

Dispose(bool)

Disposes of the object and releases associated resources.

protected override void Dispose(bool disposing)

Parameters

disposing bool

Draw(SpriteBatch, string, Vector2, float, float, float, Vector2?, float, Vector2?, float, Color?, TextStyle, FontSystemEffect, int)

Draws text using the specified parameters.

public void Draw(SpriteBatch batch, string text, Vector2 position, float size, float characterSpacing = 0, float lineSpacing = 0, Vector2? scale = null, float depth = 0.5, Vector2? origin = null, float rotation = 0, Color? color = null, TextStyle style = TextStyle.None, FontSystemEffect effect = FontSystemEffect.None, int effectAmount = 0)

Parameters

batch SpriteBatch

The sprite batch used for rendering.

text string

The text to be drawn.

position Vector2

The position where the text should be drawn.

size float

The size of the font.

characterSpacing float

The spacing between characters. Default is 0.0F.

lineSpacing float

The spacing between lines. Default is 0.0F.

scale Vector2?

The scaling factor for the text. Default is null.

depth float

The depth at which the text will be rendered. Default is 0.5F.

origin Vector2?

The origin for rotation and scaling. Default is null.

rotation float

The rotation angle for the text. Default is 0.0F.

color Color?

The color of the text. Default is white.

style TextStyle

The style of the text. Default is none.

effect FontSystemEffect

The effect to apply to the text. Default is none.

effectAmount int

The intensity of the applied effect. Default is 0.

GetSpriteFont(float)

Retrieves a FontStashSharp.DynamicSpriteFont object for the specified font size.

public DynamicSpriteFont GetSpriteFont(float fontSize)

Parameters

fontSize float

The desired font size for the retrieved sprite font.

Returns

DynamicSpriteFont

A FontStashSharp.DynamicSpriteFont instance corresponding to the specified font size.

MeasureText(string, float, Vector2?, float, float, FontSystemEffect, int)

Measures the dimensions of the specified text using the given font size and other parameters.

public Vector2 MeasureText(string text, float size, Vector2? scale = null, float characterSpacing = 0, float lineSpacing = 0, FontSystemEffect effect = FontSystemEffect.None, int effectAmount = 0)

Parameters

text string

The text to measure.

size float

The font size to use for measurement.

scale Vector2?

The scale to apply to the text, if any.

characterSpacing float

Spacing between characters, in pixels.

lineSpacing float

Spacing between lines, in pixels.

effect FontSystemEffect

Special visual effect to apply when measuring text.

effectAmount int

The intensity of the specified visual effect.

Returns

Vector2

A Vector2 representing the width and height of the text.

MeasureTextRect(string, float, Vector2?, float, float, FontSystemEffect, int)

Measures the rectangular bounds of the specified text with the given font size and additional text settings.

public RectangleF MeasureTextRect(string text, float size, Vector2? scale = null, float characterSpacing = 0, float lineSpacing = 0, FontSystemEffect effect = FontSystemEffect.None, int effectAmount = 0)

Parameters

text string

The text to be measured.

size float

The size of the font used for measurement.

scale Vector2?

Optional scale to be applied to the text. Defaults to null for no scaling.

characterSpacing float

Optional additional spacing between characters. Defaults to 0.0.

lineSpacing float

Optional additional spacing between lines. Defaults to 0.0.

effect FontSystemEffect

Optional font effect to apply. Defaults to FontStashSharp.FontSystemEffect.None.

effectAmount int

Optional intensity of the font effect. Defaults to 0.

Returns

RectangleF

A RectangleF representing the bounds of the measured text.

MeasureTextTrimmed(string, float, Vector2?, float, float, FontSystemEffect, int)

Measures the dimensions of the specified trimmed text using the provided font size.

public Vector2 MeasureTextTrimmed(string text, float size, Vector2? scale = null, float characterSpacing = 0, float lineSpacing = 0, FontSystemEffect effect = FontSystemEffect.None, int effectAmount = 0)

Parameters

text string

The text to measure.

size float

The size of the font.

scale Vector2?

An optional scaling factor for the text. Defaults to null.

characterSpacing float

The spacing between characters. Defaults to 0.0.

lineSpacing float

The spacing between lines. Defaults to 0.0.

effect FontSystemEffect

The text rendering effect to apply. Defaults to FontStashSharp.FontSystemEffect.None.

effectAmount int

The magnitude of the effect to apply. Defaults to 0.

Returns

Vector2

A Vector2 representing the width and height of the trimmed text.
